availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Rumsey, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Attended law school at the University of Louisville in 1858. Attorney in Rumsey in 1860.

ab.bibl: Catalogue of the Officers and Students in the Law Department of the University of Louisville. Session of 1859-'60. (Louisville: Hull & Brother, Printers, 1860), 15. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Rumsey, p. 12. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Archive Volume Number: 2 of 4, McLean County, Kentucky, p. 7. (Accessed via ancestry.com).
